pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Chromosomal Instability Metrics // Implement various chromosomal instability metrics. 'CINmetrics' (Chromosomal INstability metrics) provides functions to calculate various chromosomal instability metrics on masked Copy Number Variation(CNV) data at individual sample level. The chromosomal instability metrics have been implemented as described in the following studies: Baumbusch LO et al. 2013 doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0054356, Davidson JM et al. 2014 doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0079079, Chin SF et al. 2007 doi:10.1186/gb-2007-8-10-r215.
